patched_yaml:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: privileged-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: ubuntu
    image: ubuntu:22.04
    securityContext:
      privileged: false
    command:
    - sleep
    - '3600'
    resources:
      requests:
        cpu: 100m
        memory: 128Mi
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 256Mi

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: security-risk
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: web
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      hostPort: 30080
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add: []
        drop:
        - NET_RAW
        - NET_ADMIN
        - SYS_ADMIN
        - SYS_MODULE
        - SYS_PTRACE
        - SYS_CHROOT
      privileged: false
  volumes:
  - name: host-data
    hostPath:
      path: /var/lib/data

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: security-risk
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: web
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      hostPort: 30080
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add: []
        drop:

  volumes:

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: security-risk
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: web
    image: nginx:stable
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      hostPort: 30080
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        - SYS_ADMIN
  volumes:
  - name: host-data
    hostPath:
      path: /var/lib/data

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: security-risk
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - name: web
    image: nginx:latest
    ports:
    - containerPort: 8080
      hostPort: 30080
    securityContext:
      capabilities:
        add:
        - NET_RAW
        - SYS_ADMIN
      readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
      privileged: false
  volumes:
  - name: host-data
    hostPath:
      path: /var/lib/data

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:

spec:

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: release-name-postgresql-hl
  namespace: default
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: release-name
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: postgresql
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 16.1.0
    helm.sh/chart: postgresql-13.2.24
    app.kubernetes.io/component: primary
  annotations:
    service.alpha.kubernetes.io/tolerate-unready-endpoints: 'true'
spec:
  type: ExternalName
  publishNotReadyAddresses: true
  externalName: release-name-postgresql-hl.default.svc.cluster.local
